column1: What should you do if you receive an email asking for your password?
column7: Reporting phishing helps prevent credential theft.

column1: True or false: You should use the same password on every site.
column7: Using the same password makes you more vulnerable if one site is breached.

column1: Which of these is a safe way to secure your Wi-Fi?
column7: WPA3 is the most secure standard currently available.
